question.template:
<View visibleWhen="choice-selected" whenTagName="annotatorLanguage" whenChoiceValue="English"><Style> .ant-radio { height: 32px; width: 32px; } .ant-radio-inner { height: 32px; width: 32px; } .ant-radio-inner::after { height: 24px; width: 24px; margin-left: -12px; margin-top: -12px; } .ant-radio-checked .ant-radio-inner::after { transform: scale(1); } </Style>
      <Header value="{{ question_text.en }}" />
    </View>
    <View visibleWhen="choice-selected" whenTagName="annotatorLanguage" whenChoiceValue="German">
      <Header value="{{ question_text.de }}" />
    </View>
    <Choices name="{{ name }}" toName="audio" choice="single-radio" showInline="true">
      <Choice value=" " alias="True" style="background-image: url(https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/open-iconic/1.1.1/svg/thumb-up.svg);  padding-left: 4em; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain;" />
      <Choice value=" " alias="False" style="background-image: url(https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/open-iconic/1.1.1/svg/thumb-down.svg);  padding-left: 4em; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: contain;" />
    </Choices>
